entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thompson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -33.5°C

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:05 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:05 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:05 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
